description: This add-on adds many hotkeys for quick navigation through the main elements of the window, convenient interaction with chat messages, and also adds many minor improvements that make working in WhatsApp much easier.

translations.description: تضيف هذه الإضافة العديد من مفاتيح الاختصار للتنقل السريع عبر العناصر الرئيسية للنافذة، كما تسهل التفاعل مع رسائل الدردشة، وتضيف أيضًا العديد من التحسينات الطفيفة التي تجعل العمل مع WhatsApp أسهل بكثير.

Este complemento agrega muchas teclas rápidas para navegar con rapidez a través de los elementos principales de la ventana, interacción conveniente con mensajes de chat, así como muchas mejoras menores que facilitan aún más el trabajo en whatsapp.

Cette extension ajoute de nombreux raccourcis clavier facilitant la navigation dans l'interface et l'interaction avec les messages, tout en apportant de petites améliorations mineures qui rendent l'utilisation de WhatsApp bien plus simple.

Ovaj dodatak dodaje mnogo prečaca za brzu navigaciju kroz glavne elemente prozora, praktičnu interakciju s porukama razgovora, a također dodaje mnoga manja poboljšanja koja rad u WhatsAppu čine mnogo lakšim.

Questo componente aggiuntivo aggiunge molti tasti di scelta rapida per una più veloce navigazione attraverso gli elementi principali della finestra, una comoda interazione con i messaggi e aggiunge anche molti piccoli miglioramenti che rendono molto più semplice l'utilizzo di WhatsApp.

This add-on adds many hotkeys for quick navigation through the main elements of the window, convenient interaction with chat messages, and also adds many minor improvements that make working in WhatsApp much easier.

This add-on adds many hotkeys for quick navigation through the main elements of the window, convenient interaction with chat messages, and also adds many minor improvements that make working in WhatsApp much easier.

This add-on adds many hotkeys for quick navigation through the main elements of the window, convenient interaction with chat messages, and also adds many minor improvements that make working in WhatsApp much easier.

Acest add-on adaugă multe taste de acces rapid pentru navigare rapidă prin elementele principale ale ferestrei, interacțiune convenabilă cu mesajele de chat și, de asemenea, adaugă multe îmbunătățiri minore care fac utilizarea WhatsApp Beta mult mai ușoară.

Это дополнение добавляет множество горячих клавиш для быстрого перемещения между основными элементами окна, удобного взаимодействия с сообщениями в чате, а также добавляет множество небольших улучшений, делающих работу с WhatsApp более удобной.

Ovaj dodatak dodaje mnogo interventnih tastera za brzu navigaciju kroz glavne elemente prozora, zgodnu interakciju sa porukama za ćaskanje, a takođe dodaje mnoga manja poboljšanja koja znatno olakšavaju rad u WhatsapP-u.

Bu eklenti, pencerenin ana öğelerinde hızlı gezinme, sohbet mesajlarıyla kolay etkileşim için birçok kısayol tuşu ekler ve ayrıca whatsapp'ta çalışmayı çok daha kolaylaştıran birçok küçük iyileştirme ekler.

This add-on adds many hotkeys for quick navigation through the main elements of the window, convenient interaction with chat messages, and also adds many minor improvements that make working in WhatsApp much easier.
